name: Acolyte
description: You spent your life in the service of a temple.

name: Criminal
description: You have a history of breaking the law.

name: Folk Hero
description: You rose from humble beginnings to defend your people.

name: Noble
description: You come from a noble family and were raised in privilege.

name: Sage
description: You spent years learning the lore of the multiverse.

name: Soldier
description: You have seen battle and are trained in warfare.
